title: How to Get a Girl to Like You in Fifth Grade

steps.title: Be friendship-minded and easy-paced.
steps.content: Be friendship-minded and easy-paced. Girls don't like guys who spend all their time on getting a girl, they might suspect a "player" rather than good friendship material. Also, don't be whiny or a crybaby because girls don't want to be friends with people who just sit around and whine.

steps.title: Be funny.
steps.content: Be funny. Humor is an attractive trait for any person and it helps ease tension and awkwardness. [1] X Research source It can also reassure a girl that you're not being overly confident and self-inflated. Being funny and smiling can make you seem more confident and approachable to a girl. Reader Poll: We asked 1296 wikiHow readers and 60% of them agreed that the best way to get a girl’s attention at school is by making eye contact and smiling . [Take Poll]

steps.title: Be yourself.
steps.content: Be yourself. Don't try to be sporty, geeky, hipster, etc. if you're not. On the other hand, be as much of the person you really are so that she accepts you as yourself. Always be polite though––just because you like gross humor or practical jokes doesn't mean she deserves to be on the receiving end of those. Use your common sense––making friends requires holding back on being silly, rude or just plain dumb. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Respect the worries and concerns the girl likely has.
steps.content: Respect the worries and concerns the girl likely has. She is no different from you in worrying about being rejected, ignored or made fun of. Reassure her that you don't intend to do any of that to her and she'll be glad to spend time with you.

steps.title: Choose a girl who knows you just a little already.
steps.content: Choose a girl who knows you just a little already. It is almost impossible to get a girl to like you when you're not in her homeroom. Try someone who is in your homeroom, to make things easier.

steps.title: Ask to hang out with her at recess, or sit with her at lunch and bring up a conversation.
steps.content: Ask to hang out with her at recess, or sit with her at lunch and bring up a conversation. It's always best to be friends first, and after you take it slow, then you can tell her you like her, or ask her out if both of you are allowed to date or not. You can show a genuine interest in the things the girl likes. Try to find out more about those things. [3] X Research source Then incorporate them within a date or in your grand gesture. [4] X Research source It will show her that you pay attention to what she says and prioritize it because you know it will make her happy. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Walk home with her.
steps.content: Walk home with her. Ask her where she lives and walk home with her. She will like the company.

steps.title: Try emailing her or giving her a phone call.
steps.content: Try emailing her or giving her a phone call. She will probably appreciate the fact that you would like to know her better.

steps.title: Try to get her friends to like you too.
steps.content: Try to get her friends to like you too. If her friends have a negative opinion of you, she might think it's true. It's best to get to know her friends as well. If she does not have friends, be her friend.

steps.title: Let her feel comfortable around you.
steps.content: Let her feel comfortable around you. She will grow to consider you a safe person to be around and will want to be friends with you. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Make sure she's the right one before deciding to become romantic with her.
steps.content: Make sure she's the right one before deciding to become romantic with her. Realize that at your age, friendship is more realistic and that if you are romantic together, it most likely won't last and you might lose her friendship for good if that happens. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Don't jump into kissing.
steps.content: Don't jump into kissing. You guys have only known each other this way for less than a year. Give yourselves some time before you kiss, if at all. This part really isn't necessary and you might prefer just being good, solid friends. [8] X Research source
